data.text: @CarlNyberg312 @BlockClubCHI I'm so curious about the business licences and approvals for these places.  It took almost a year for Stan's Donuts to get approvals to open their first Lincoln Park shop.  So long that they eventually cut out the "coming soon" on their pre-opening window coverings!
@BlockClubCHI I am surprised considering what a great job testing has done to stop the spread......along with masks and lockdowns
@BlockClubCHI 中共真對人類實施生態滅亡計劃，麻雀已經在中國一些城市完全消失，穿山甲已被商業性「滅絕」，高鼻羚羊滅絕，白鳍豚滅絕，动植物灭绝不可逆转。

@BlockClubCHI The CCP really implements an ecological extinction plan for human beings. Sparrows have completely disappeared in some Chinese cities, pangolins have been commercially "extinct", baiji dolphins have become extinct, The extinction of plants and animals is irreversible.
@BlockClubCHI The private sector is more efficient at delivering services.
